Sorry your Suns didn't make it to the finals, Huck. You gonna watch anyway? I think I will be cheering for the Cavs. I also think King James is gonna get MVP.

I didn't watch. Seemed pointless. Only highlights one very bad and biased call of the NBA. After that call the entire series was ruined for me. Not just because I love the suns but because the NBA acted capriciously and without real consideration. Their zero tolerance was not really zero tolerance and only made the NBA look bad.
 
 Thanks for the comment though. Sorry for not getting back to you timely.
 
 Huck
I ended up not watching either - sounds like the Cavs leaned to much on James tho...even a player as talented as he can't do it alone.
